column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=In Haldimand-Norfolk , the three hottest topics in this election are the impasse over land claims in Caledonia , the state of agriculture and food policy , and health care .
#Text=Land Claims
#Text=I will make the impasse in Caledonia a cabinet priority .
#Text=This dispute is a federal problem that requires a federal response .
#Text=Negotiations must happen with frequency , and I will ensure that interim targets are established and met within a timeline .

#Text=I will do more to ensure this dispute is resolved , and ensure that the Federal , Provincial and local governments work together with Police Services to resolve this impasse in a timely manner .
#Text=Agriculture and Food Policy
#Text=We need a food policy that puts Canadian farmers first .
#Text=I will fight for a national food strategy that prioritizes Canadian farming by promoting local agriculture , food safety and food security .
#Text=Canadians should be encouraged to buy local food stuffs , however , we have to ensure they are protected from food-born illnesses .
#Text=The government must do more to support farmers and to keep our food supply safe .
#Text=I believe in the wheat board and support supply management .
#Text=Farm programs should be simplified and made transparent .
#Text=The Conservative government has marginalized the farming communities it claims to represent .
#Text=We need concrete support for our farmers and a real solution for tobacco producers , not more politics and posturing .
#Text=Health Care
#Text=Families in Haldimand-Norfolk deserve quality health care .
#Text=As a medical doctor , I understand the challenges facing our communities , including a lack of physicians , long wait times and spiraling drug costs .
#Text=The size of your bank account should not be the determinant of the quality of care you receive .
#Text=We will continue to fight to ensure that the future of health care does not follow this course .
#Text=Our health care system should remain publicly-funded and properly funded .
#Text=All patients have a fundamental right to receive access to timely care for necessary medical services .
#Text=It is unacceptable that too many Canadians are without a family physician .
#Text=Wait times in emergency rooms or for important diagnoses are too long because there are n't enough nurses or other medical professionals to keep up with the increasing needs .
#Text=With an aging population we need a plan to ensure greater access to health care professionals .
#Text=I will work hard to attract new doctors and bring better health services to our communities .
#Text=I will support the Liberal Doctors and Nurses Fund , which will invest $ 420 million to ensure all Canadians have access to a medical professional .
#Text=I will also work to ensure that the goals of the National Pharmaceuticals Strategy are achieved , namely catastrophic drug coverage .
#Text=Are there any misconceptions about you , your leader , or your party and platform ?
#Text=I think there are several misconceptions about Stéphane Dion .
#Text=He is a strong , thoughtful leader who is genuine in his desire to serve the best interests of Canadians .
#Text=Throughout the Liberal leadership campaign , his integrity was never questioned .
